Hellplague/ Malice/ Injustice:

"You are waiting on nothing right now," Hellplague announced as she 
walked in.  
Following her was a bot about identical to Malice, but his coloring 
was much differant.  He was a deep purple and black, and was quite 
shiny.  His expression was one on the verge of insanity.
"Uh, Hellplague, who or what is that?" Malice asked, pointing to the 
bot standing next to Hellplague.
"This is Injustice.  I cloned him a while ago, really a few cycles 
ago.  Your body structure is something else Malice."
The clone took a few steps forward, and turned his psychotic gaze to 
Malice and Blacknightmare.  Something about him really messed with 
Malice, this wasn't some servant, this bot was dangerous.
"Mal...ice, Blacknight...mare."
The clone then reached for the femme, but Malice shoved the clone 
away.  
"Hands off, freak!"
Injustice growled and jumped Malice, and hung on to the Hunter 
Killer, who was thrashing about and finally got a hold of him.  He 
began to pry the thing's claws away from his face.
"Get off of me, freak," Malice growled as he threw Injustice to the 
ground.
He kicked the clone over to Hellplague, who he hid behind.  
Hellplague scolded Malice, but also was suprised.  Why was Injustice 
so radically differant?  It didn't matter right now, now she had a 
raid to lead.
"Darkfate, are you ready to go?" she asked, resting a hand on her hip.
Malice stood next to Blacknightmare, rubbing around his neck, staring 
knives at Injustice.
